amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used to amend the oath of allegiance required by section 337 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3608 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3608 proposed by Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S9008-9009, S9013-9014; text: CR S9008) To prohibit funds from being used to amend the oath of allegiance required by section 337 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3608 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3608 proposed by Senator Alexander.
